DOC.criteria: Age least 18 year . Type 2 diabetes treat insulin therapy least 6 month prior study enrolment . HbA1c 58 108 mmol/mol ( 7.5 12.0 % ) inclusive . Age least 18 year . Type 2 diabetes treat insulin therapy least 6 month prior study enrolment . HbA1c 58 108 mmol/mol ( 7.5 12.0 % ) inclusive . Participant currently prescribe animal insulin . Total daily dose insulin ( TDD ) > 1.75 iu/kg entry study . Concomitant disease condition may compromise patient safety include limited ; cystic fibrosis , severe mental illness , diagnose suspect eat disorder uncontrolled long term medical condition . Has pacemaker neurostimulators . Currently prescribed oral , intramuscular intravenous steroid therapy acute chronic condition require study period . Currently receive dialysis treatment plan receive dialysis study . Women pregnant , plan become pregnant become pregnant study . Participating another study glucose monitoring device drug could affect glucose measurement management . Currently use / previously use sensor base Glucose Monitoring System ( include retrospective glucose monitoring system ) within last 6 month . Currently use Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion ( CSII ) . Known ( suspect ) allergy medical grade adhesive . In investigator 's opinion participant unsuitable participate due cause/reason .
